    • checkExamTakenAndPublished

      public static boolean checkExamTakenAndPublished(ArrayList<String> examTaken, Exam exam)
      A method to check if an Exam is not taken and already published
      Parameters:
      examTaken - a list of Exam taken by this student
      exam - the Exam to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the Exam has not taken and published false if the Exam has taken or not published

      public static boolean checkSameStudentName(ExamAttempt attempt, String studentName)
      A method to check if the ExamAttempt is done by this student
      Parameters:
      attempt - the ExamAttempt to be checked
      studentName - the student name to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the ExamAttempt belongs to this student false if the ExamAttempt do not belongs to this student

      public static boolean checkSameExam(Exam exam, String selectedExamName)
      A method to check if the Exam object matches with an exam name
      Parameters:
      exam - the exam object to be checked
      selectedExamName - the exam name
      Returns:
      true if the exam object has the same name with given name false otherwise

    • checkTakenExam

      public static boolean checkTakenExam(ArrayList<String> examTakenList, String selectedCourseName, String selectedExamName)
      A method to check if an Exam has been taken by this student
      Parameters:
      examTakenList - a list Exam taken
      selectedCourseName - the course name of Exam to be checked
      selectedExamName - the exam name of Exam to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the Exam has taken false otherwise

      Parameters:
      exam - the Exam object to be checked
      selectedCourseName - the course name
      selectedExamName - the exam name
      Returns:
      true if the names match false otherwise
